dc:title: Review of All God's Children
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Depicts the loving work of Dorothy and Bill Gauchat with "the saddest, most hopeless, most incurable of crippled children. Says she couldn't put their book down until she finished the last page. "The story is a picture of what could be done."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 915 1975-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
